net.big_oh.postoffice
Interface IPostOfficeService

public interface IPostOfficeService

As an uber-thin wrapper around the Apache Commons Email framework, instances of IPostOfficeService represent the concept of a "neighborhood" post office from which an application can send email messages without worrying about quotidian delivery details. In other words, an IPostOfficeService object allows you to send an email message with a single line of code: PostOfficeServiceFactory.getInstance().sendMail("foo@bar.com", "Hello ...", "World!");

See Also:
PostOfficeServiceFactory
